Norwalk.Norfield Historic District:
The Norfield Historic District is a 18-acre (7.3 ha) historic district in Weston, Connecticut that was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1991. It includes the present-day town center of Weston, which was known as Norfield during 1795-1920.
It was listed for its meeting architectural criteria, and included 16 contributing buildings.
